question.title: Exception found when using itextpdf TiffImage function
question.body:
I got the following exception when using iTextPDF 5 to get the Image from Tiff.

Any idea how to resolve it?

`

Image img = Image.getInstance(myTiffFile);

Caused by: com.itextpdf.text.ExceptionConverter: Bits per sample 16 is not supported.
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Bits per sample 16 is not supported.
    at com.itextpdf.text.pdf.codec.TiffImage.getTiffImageColor(TiffImage.java:381) ~[itextpdf-5.5.13.4.jar:5.5.13.4]
    at com.itextpdf.text.pdf.codec.TiffImage.getTiffImage(TiffImage.java:119) ~[itextpdf-5.5.13.4.jar:5.5.13.4]
    at com.itextpdf.text.pdf.codec.TiffImage.getTiffImage(TiffImage.java:317) ~[itextpdf-5.5.13.4.jar:5.5.13.4]
    at com.itextpdf.text.pdf.codec.TiffImage.getTiffImage(TiffImage.java:305) ~[itextpdf-5.5.13.4.jar:5.5.13.4]
    at com.itextpdf.text.Image.getInstance(Image.java:428) ~[itextpdf-5.5.13.4.jar:5.5.13.4]
    at com.itextpdf.text.Image.getInstance(Image.java:374) ~[itextpdf-5.5.13.4.jar:5.5.13.4]

`

question_comments.body: You will probably need to convert the image to a format supported by itext 5.

The format TIFF offers a large number of options how to store image data and iText 5 does not support all of them. Here the image appears to be stored using a bits per sample rate of 16 which iText does not seem to support.
